name: Space Valkyrie vs The Mole People
name_original: Space Valkyrie vs The Mole People
description:
Are you a bad enough Valkyrie to beat the Mole People?

Defeat mole people, get upgrades, and foil an invasion from under the Earth itself! But don't run out of time!

Made for the 2022 Ms Paint's Jam by a lone developer over the course of 2 weeks. Almost all 2D assets made in MS Paint XP. Made in Godot.

Controller strongly suggested, but perfectly playable with mouse and keyboard.
